<small>Hebrew form: [[H1354]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּב‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** either ==back== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּב‎</span> ***back, top***; Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּב‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גנב‎</span>), or &lt; side (√ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גנב‎</span>, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> side, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***side***, √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — see also [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>WB 65</sup>); — plural suffix [[Dan.7.6|Dan 7:6]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] wings <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַלגַּֿבַּיהּ‎</span> on ***its sides*** ([[BDB#Bev|Bev]] [[BDB#Behrm|Behrm]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּבַּהּ‎</span> perhaps ***its back***, so most).
